enhanced_by.reason: The create method requires the longOption to be set before it can be invoked, otherwise it throws an IllegalArgumentException.
The create method uses the description set by withDescription to create the Option instance.
The create method uses the argCount and optionalArg state set by hasArg to configure the Option instance.
Both create and the Option constructor create an Option instance with similar properties.
The create method sets the long option using Option.setLongOpt, which can be used to verify the state of the created Option.
The create method sets the required flag using Option.setRequired, which can be used to verify the state of the created Option.
